GTRK.ME.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company Globaltruck Management
GTRK.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Globaltruck Management provides full truck load trucking services in Russia and internationally. It offers standard transportation services using full truck load long-haul trucks; and temperature-controlled transportation services. As of June 30, 2017, the company operated a fleet of 1,090 trucks, as well as 1,170 trailers, including 768 tents and 402 refrigerator trailers. It serves retail, fast-moving consumer goods, manufacturing, bulk, e-commerce, and parcel industry sectors. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Moscow, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company Globaltruck Management is a subsidiary of GT Globaltruck Limited.
